DIFFERENTIAL CARRIER ASSEMBLY, R & R and/or Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. Steam clean
3. Drain and refill housing and carrier
4. R&R axle shafts and gaskets
5. R&R Input shaft yoke if applicable
6. Disconnect and connect prop shafts
7. Clean carrier mating surfaces
8. Road test

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours

POWER DIVIDER SHIFT FORK AND/OR CLUTCH COLLAR (IN CHASSIS), Replace

Includes:
1. Disassemble, clean, inspect and replace all failed or damaged parts
2. Shim to achieve correct end play tolerance

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
All Axles (Except 14GDA & 14GDC) A14-160 All Models 2.5
14GDA & 14GDC A14-161 All Models 2.0

REAR AXLE HOUSING, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. D&C prop shaft(s)
3. R&R axle shafts and gaskets
4. R&R wheel assemblies
5. Replace wheel seals
6. R&R differential
7. R&R brake components
8. D&C air or hydraulic lines, bleed brakes when required
9. Drain and refill housing and carrier
10. Adjust rear wheel brakes on axle replaced (air brakes)
11. Clean, inspect and adjust wheel bearings
12. Road test

Excludes:
1. CUTTING AND REWELDING (TRANSFERRING) OF ANY BRACKETRY TO NEW HOUSING

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Single Axle All Suspensions A14-100 All Models 5.2
Forward Rear Axle Air/Leaf Suspensions A14-101 All Models 7.6
Rear Rear Axle Air/Leaf Suspensions A14-102 All Models 5.9
Forward Rear Axle Equalizer Beam Suspension A14-103 All Models 6.7
Rear Rear Axle Equalizer Beam Suspension A14-104 All Models 5.5

Addon If Required   Code Applies To Hours
HYDRAULIC BRAKES [BLEED BRAKES ON REAR AXLE(S)],        
A14-100-1 All Models 0.3

REAR HUB BEARINGS/RACES (WHEEL BEARINGS), Replace

Includes:
1. R&R wheels when required and torque to spec
2. R&R hub & drum or caliper, or hub & rotor assembly
3. Replace wheel seal
4. Clean, inspect and adjust wheel bearings and brake shoes
5. Check/fill lube

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Drum Brake One Wheel A14-180 All Models 1.2
Caliper Disc Brake One Wheel A14-181 All Models 1.5
Drum Brake One Axle, Both Wheels A14-182 All Models 2.0
Caliper Disc Brake One Axle, Both Wheels A14-183 All Models 2.4

REAR WHEEL HUB OIL SEAL, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R wheels when required and torque to spec
3. R&R axle shaft, hub & drum or caliper, or hub & rotor assembly
4. Clean, inspect hub, repack or lube bearing(s); Adjust bearings. Adjust brakes (drum brakes only)

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Drum Brake One Wheel A14-190 All Models 1.1
Caliper Disc Brake One Wheel A14-191 All Models 1.4
Drum Brake One Axle, Both Wheels A14-192 All Models 1.8
Caliper Disc Brake One Axle, Both Wheels A14-193 All Models 2.4
